channel.title: Reviews and Multimedia Board Addition!
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,256.0.html
Recent addition to the general interests and hobbies section, this board is welcome to anyone wishing to have their work commented on (original songs, writing, etc), or any reviews you have written in the past.
We know topics like this have been posted in general discussion for a while now, it was brought to our attention that a new board would be suitable for these types of topics.

item.title: Reviews and Multimedia Board Addition!
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:32, topic:512767”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=631011.msg4276560#msg4276560 date=1365025480]

Like the above, I agree with that MITB should be merged with moparscape than since we’re “widening” our forum topics. I don’t want to hide that category because i use some of the other boards in that category.

Moparisthebest is strongly against this idea iirc, I think there was a topic about it made on moparisthebest.com and he wrote down his views on it, which I agree with to an extent. It would be easier visiting one site than two but at the same time I think Moparisthebest.com should stay as is. It would also cause a lot of issues, gravedigging wise. There’s topics that were last posted in in 2011 on the first page which isn’t exactly ideal.

Well MITB has way different categories, and a much more ‘intelligent’ member base, I don’t think that the would want a bunch of topics in the computer sections who’s titles are
“HELP MEH I TINK I HAZ VIRUS”
[/quote]Not sure if your insulting MSCP as a whole or just the idiot leechers…

[hr]

As a person who does not program/have any desire to start learning but just like to chat as a forum poster I think this is a good step ahead. From what I have experienced though since my time on this forum is that there really isn’t a 24/7 active base. While we do have people from all over the globe here most of the time it is a one sided conversation until certain times of the day.[/quote]no most of us tink we haz virus.

Read full topic

Moparisthebest is strongly against this idea iirc, I think there was a topic about it made on moparisthebest.com and he wrote down his views on it, which I agree with to an extent. It would be easier visiting one site than two but at the same time I think Moparisthebest.com should stay as is. It would also cause a lot of issues, gravedigging wise. There’s topics that were last posted in in 2011 on the first page which isn’t exactly ideal.
[/quote]
Well MITB has way different categories, and a much more ‘intelligent’ member base, I don’t think that the would want a bunch of topics in the computer sections who’s titles are
“HELP MEH I TINK I HAZ VIRUS”[/quote]Not sure if your insulting MSCP as a whole or just the idiot leechers…

[hr]

As a person who does not program/have any desire to start learning but just like to chat as a forum poster I think this is a good step ahead. From what I have experienced though since my time on this forum is that there really isn’t a 24/7 active base. While we do have people from all over the globe here most of the time it is a one sided conversation until certain times of the day.

item.title: Reviews and Multimedia Board Addition!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:27, topic:512767”]Books and other writings of the like aren’t considered media?[/quote]They are, but multimedia is specifically the combination of different types of media. The most common being video with audio and text (like a youtube video, or TV commercial). Plain text is not considered multimedia. Oddly enough, by the wording of the section you could post a review of a book, but not make a post just about a book. Maybe it needs to be reworded

[quote=“Lin, post:28, topic:512767”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=631011.msg4276848#msg4276848 date=1365043763]

[quote author=Ruby link=topic=631011.msg4276743#msg4276743 date=1365033385]

My suggestion actually got put forward?

Edit: actually reading through some comments, i wasn’t the only 1?

This idea has come up quite a few times before
[/quote]Yeah, and it was shut down for good reason. No idea why this went through to be honest, it’s already dead less than a week later. I don’t see why we have to have new boards for things that are fine in other boards, when we don’t have the content to back it up. Making a RS07 board is good, because the RuneScape board was getting flooded with it. We made a Minecraft board when General Discussion was getting flooded with Minecraft stuff, but… I see nothing to warrant this. Oh well.
[/quote]Many people were posting media in the General Discussion, and I’ve been wanting to share some things. However, for some reason nobody’s actually posting in it.[/quote]I hadn’t seen much at all really… at least enough for it to make sense to have a whole section for it

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:20, topic:512767”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=631011.msg4276535#msg4276535 date=1365024746]

Like the above, I agree with that MITB should be merged with moparscape than since we’re “widening” our forum topics. I don’t want to hide that category because i use some of the other boards in that category.

Moparisthebest is strongly against this idea iirc, I think there was a topic about it made on moparisthebest.com and he wrote down his views on it, which I agree with to an extent. It would be easier visiting one site than two but at the same time I think Moparisthebest.com should stay as is. It would also cause a lot of issues, gravedigging wise. There’s topics that were last posted in in 2011 on the first page which isn’t exactly ideal.
[/quote]
Well MITB has way different categories, and a much more ‘intelligent’ member base, I don’t think that the would want a bunch of topics in the computer sections who’s titles are
“HELP MEH I TINK I HAZ VIRUS”[/quote]
They aren’t a much more intelligent group of people, they’re just older therefore seem smarter and wiser. You can’t really compare an average age of 16 against an average age of 20+, there’s a whole load of differentiating features that make them seem a lot more intelligent where in actual fact they’re just more mature.

Read full topic

item.title: Reviews and Multimedia Board Addition!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:8, topic:512767”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=631011.msg4273866#msg4273866 date=1364774585]
Might as well no one even posts on MITB any more, the top 4 or so thread creators have spammed MITB for a while now.
[/quote]
That’s the problem, the topics are all outdated and people will effectively be posting on year long dead threads.[/quote]

So what if the threads are old, people can still create new discussion in an older thread. The only reason no one posts is because most of the people on here don’t even know it exists just like the wiki.

Read full topic
